dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: The LibriSpeech corpus consists of 960 hours of read English from audiobooks, used for evaluation purposes, with the dev-clean and dev-other sets used for validation, while test-clean and test-other were employed for evaluation.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:description: The AMI meeting corpus consists of 100 hours of meeting recordings involving 4-5 individuals, divided into train, dev, and eval sets, used to demonstrate the effectiveness of contextual biasing.
dcterms:title: AMI Meeting Corpus
